reviewText: This is a great video with a wonderful dance company
It's definitely worth streaming this from Amazon on Demand rather than buying the DVD. Much better video quality as it's available in widescreen HD rather than the 4:3 SD format.

Love the stength, the force and the vitality of the whole group. Beautiful, smooth yet forceful spirit throughout the whole dance. Delighted to see some yoga poses incorporated in it. Highly recommended.
A must for those who love dance & discipline ! A perfect mix of East & West which weren't supposed to mix ?

Aun no he podido sacarle el provecho que esperaba, lo he visto dos veces, en la primera quede muy impresionado, a la segunda vez me parecio un poco repetitivo.  De todas formas sigo pensando que es un buen video para entretenerse de una forma muy diferente a la que acostumbro a travs de una pantalla.
